title: JavacharKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about JavacharKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
char myGrade = 'B';
System.out.println(myGrade);

Definition and Usage
The
char
keyword is a data type that is used to store a single character.
A char value must be surrounded by single quotes, like 'A' or 'c'.
Related Pages
Read more about data types in our
Java Data Types Tutorial
.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers JavacharKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use JavacharKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
